sentences.en: Our complaint was dealt with satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 我们的投诉得到了满意的处理。

sentences.en: Her disappearance has never been satisfactorily explained.
sentences.cn: 她的失踪一直没有得到令人信服的解释。

sentences.en: The film ended most satisfactorily: vice punished and virtue rewarded.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的结尾皆大欢喜：邪恶受到惩治，美德得到回报。
